SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) AS RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.BOARD_CD, A.BOARD_TITLE, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.BOARD_DVSN) BOARD_DVSN, A.BOARD_DVSN AS BOARD_DVSN_CODE, A.BOARD_AUTHOR, B.AUTHOR_NM AS BOARD_AUTHOR_NM, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.BOARD_SIZE) BOARD_SIZE, A.BOARD_SIZE AS BOARD_SIZE_CODE, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.BOARD_NOTICE_DVSN) BOARD_NOTICE_DVSN, A.BOARD_NOTICE_DVSN AS BOARD_NOTICE_DVSN_CODE, A.USE_YN, FN_SEASON_CENTERNM(A.BOARD_CENTER_ID) BOARD_CENTER_ID, A.BOARD_CENTER_ID AS BOARD_CENTER_ID_CODE, A.BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_YN, A.BOARD_CMNT_USE, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_UPDT_DTM FROM TSES_BRDSET_INFO_M A, COMTNAUTHORINFO b WHERE A.BOARD_AUTHOR = b.AUTHOR_CODE
AND ( A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%') OR A.BOARD_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%') )
ORDER BY A.LAST_UPDT_DTM DESC ) TB ) TA WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY TA.RNUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_CD, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DVSN, BOARD_AUTHOR, BOARD_CENTER_ID, BOARD_SIZE, BOARD_NOTICE_DVSN, USE_YN, BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_YN, BOARD_CMNT_USE, FRST_REGTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_DTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_DTM FROM TSES_BRDSET_INFO_M WHERE BOARD_CD = #{boardCd}
